title: Mr Ikegami's Flight
brief_description: Mr. Ikegami (Kazuhiro Muroyama) is sent to Australia from Japan on business. His task is to locate the boss’s wife whose gone missing. Speaking no English and confined mostly to his hotel room, Mr. Ikegami realises the futility of his search and longs to be back home with his expectant wife.
